mdRecord.dcterms:title: Brandeville / Groupe des canevas de tir
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: France. Armée. Groupe de canevas de tir. [original]
United States. Army. Corps of Engineers. Regiment, 29th. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : col. ; 90 x 65 cm. on sheet 102 x 76 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Relief shown by contour lines and spot heights, with contour interval of 5 meters. [original]

Covers a portion of the Meuse Départ. inthe Lorraine region of France. Brandeville is central to the map, which extends southwest to Vilosnes-sur Meuse, to Wavrille in the southeast, to Mouzay in the northwest, and Remoiville in the northeast. [original]

In lower left, outside neatine: Quadrillage Lambert - Les Cotes en noir sont celles de la Carte au 1/80,000e, est n'ont qu'une valeur approximative -- L'Altitude exacte est celle des cotes en bistre et de courbes de 5 en 5m. [original]
With additional manuscript markings in red and blue pencil. From the Joseph P. Ast World War I papers, MSS 13905-a. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Ast, Joseph Phillip, 1882-1975--Library--Personal copy
